trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANPIX114_03702_SEQ_00<tab>Uin Nee is expecting the unexpected.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANPIX114_03702_UINNEE_000_000<tab>I've been trying to come up with new ways to help the children have fun and memorable dreams, but I'm struggling to come up with any ideas.

TEXT_BANPIX114_03702_UINNEE_000_001<tab>Ah! That's it! I'm thinking about this too much. I need something unexpected, something spontaneous. After all, dreams are by their very nature unpredictable! And I think I know the perfect place to search for inspiration.
TEXT_BANPIX114_03702_UINNEE_000_002<tab>The rivers that flow from the east carry a whole hodgepodge of things from other lands, which collects in the waterfalls. Why not go and see what you can find?
TEXT_BANPIX114_03702_UINNEE_000_003<tab>I could go myself, but I wouldn't want to deprive you of the chance to prove your usefulness. There's junk to be collected, so you'd best get to it!
TEXT_BANPIX114_03702_UINNEE_000_004<tab>I'm not looking for anything in particular, I just need ideas!
TEXT_BANPIX114_03702_SYSTEM_120_010<tab>You find a fruit of the forest!
TEXT_BANPIX114_03702_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>A phooka comes tumbling out of nowhere!
TEXT_BANPIX114_03702_UINNEE_000_020<tab>So, did you come across anything surprising?

TEXT_BANPIX114_03702_UINNEE_000_021<tab>Hmm... That's a fine piece of...whatever it is. Porcelain, I think. Yes! I can transform it into a cup and host a tea party! We might need more than one cup, though.

TEXT_BANPIX114_03702_UINNEE_000_022<tab>A branch? Not quite as unusual as I was hoping for, I must say. Bits of wood like this are rather commonplace in Il Mheg, you know. Still, it's about the right size for a magic wand. Perhaps the children can pretend to be wizards!

TEXT_BANPIX114_03702_UINNEE_000_023<tab>What's this? Fruit of some description? I can't tell a pixieberry from my elbow, I have to say. Ah! If we plant this, it can grow into a great big tree, and we can make a treehouse!
TEXT_BANPIX114_03702_UINNEE_000_024<tab>Eh? A phooka nearly fell on you!? Rather you than me!

TEXT_BANPIX114_03702_UINNEE_000_025<tab>Still, it was worth all the trouble! It's strange to think something so mundane could lead to such a fantastic idea! Of course, we have my imagination to thank for that. Honestly, where would you be without me?
